verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come ye disconsolate Where'er ye languish Come to the mercy seat Fervently kneel Here bring Your wounded hearts Here tell your anguish Earth has no sorrows That heav'n cannot heal{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Joy of the comfortless Light of the straying Hope of the penitent Fadeless and pure Here speaks The Comforter In mercy saying Earth has no sorrows That heav'n cannot cure{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here see the Bread of Life See waters flowing Forth from the throne of God Pure from above Come to the feast prepared Come ever knowing Earth has no sorrows But heav'n can remove{/lang-eng}
